document_data.name: Raashub
document_data.History: Raashub was the captain of a ship of chaos that crashed into the [[Lake of Shadows]] in the [[Underdark]] and was trapped in time in a whirlwind. At the end of [[1372 DR]] or the beginning of [[1373 DR]], [[Pharaun Mizzrym]] and his group, led by [[Quenthel Baenre]], sought out and repaired the ship in order to travel with it to the [[Demonweb Pits]] in search of [[Lolth]]. Pharaun was able to bind the uridezu captain with a locket and wax figurine, but Raashub's attempted to escape by summoning rats and [[gate|gating]] in his cousin [[Jaershed]]. The group defeated the attack, but with Raashub gone, Pharaun was forced to learn to control the ship of chaos himself (with the secret help of the invisible [[Aliisza]]). The group traveled with the ship, but it shattered on the [[Plane of Infinite Portals]].
document_data.Abilities: Raashub had the ability to summon [[rat]]s.
